fullplot: While driving , the pregnant horror-movie actress Kyèko Harase and her fiancè are in a car crash caused by the Toshio's friend. Kyèko loses her baby and her fiancè winds up in a coma. Kyèko was cursed together with a television crew when they shot a show in the haunted house where Kayako was brutally murdered by her husband years ago. While each member of the team dies or disappears, Kyèko is informed that she has a three-and-a-half-month-old fetus in her womb.
plot: As their curse spreads on all around, the ghosts find their chance to live once again through the pregnancy of a cursed woman.
title: Ju-on: The Grudge 2
